item.title: market watch 2026
item.description:
Theodosius Dobzhansky: Nothing in biology makes sense except in the light of evolution.

2026-01-23: Gold-$4949, Sliver above $100 for the first time

2026-01-22: Gold=$4863, Bitcoin=89K, S&P500=6K9, Dow=49K

  • Guess there’s been an ongoing diversification away from US assets after Orange2.0. Gold is used in two ways against fiat currencies (inflation) and US dollars (uncertainty).

  • Besides trade war, there’s a capital war. “If there’s a military move, it has capital-war implication.” Ray Dalio said at WEF Davos 2026. “Fiat currencies and debt as a storehold of wealth are not being held by central banks in the same way,” Dalio said. “The biggest market to move last year was gold — far better than the tech markets.”
